attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2004-1165

Date: 2004-10-12

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of National Defence and the Treasury Board, pursuant to subsection 12(1) of the National Defence Act, hereby makes the annexed Regulations Repealing the Regulations Respecting the Provision of Educational Facilities at Defence Establishments in Canada.


                     Sur recommandation du ministre de la Défense nationale et du Conseil du Trésor et en vertu du paragraphe 12(1) de la Loi sur la défense nationale, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil prend le Règlement abrogeant le règlement intitulé « Regulations Respecting the Provision of Educational Facilities at Defence Establishments in Canada », ci-après.


REGULATIONS REPEALING THE REGULATIONS RESPECTING THE

PROVISION OF EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES AT DEFENCE

ESTABLISHMENTS IN CANADA

 

repeal

 

1. The Regulations Respecting the Provision of Educational Facilities at Defence Establishments in Canada are repealed.

 

coming into force

 

2. These Regulations come into force on the day on which they are made.


RÈGLEMENT ABROGEANT LE RÈGLEMENT INTITULÉ

« REGULATIONS RESPECTING THE PROVISION OF EDUCATIONAL

FACILITIES AT DEFENCE ESTABLISHMENTS IN CANADA »

 

abrogation

 

1. Le règlement intitulé « Regulations Respecting the Provision of Educational Facilities at Defence Establishments in Canada » est abrogé.

 

entrée en vigueur

 

2. Le présent règlement entre en vigueur à la date de sa prise.
